name: Euretta
description:
A text adventure, Western reinterpretation of the Orpheus myth. A Stranger journeys through an Underworld forest to reach the Pacific Ocean and discover closure with his lost love.

There are four endings, and an atmospheric score by Max Lescohier.

Content warning for: brief flashes of violence, horror, gore.

Music:

Opening: https://www.dropbox.com/s/dco3h66im47knhd/EurettaOpening.mp3?dl=0

Danger: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4dmg2u4jy02h6tw/EurettaDogSceneShortened.mp3?dl=0

Ending: https://www.dropbox.com/s/l9jiil1xe2f2jei/Ending-1.mp3?dl=0
